1.「おお……。<pc>か……。| よく…来てくれたな……。| ルナナの足取りが……: Oh... <pc>... how nice... that you|came... to find out... where Lunana is... and|how she got there...

Lunana followed the Magical Beast Byblos from|here in Raniakka southwest through the Zagban|Hills to the Cave of Zaag in the far south.|
|...

3.「じつはな…… その ザアグの洞門こそ| わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討ち: You see... the Cave of Zaag is the place where|I once defeated Leon Buvrot... and where Holta|died. The place of our meeting.

4.「なにやら いやな予感がする……。| レオン・ビュブロの子である 魔獣ビュブロス: I have a bad feeling about this... Why is|Magical Beast Byblos, the son of Leon Byblos,|heading to the place of their connection...?

5.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。| わしを…… かの地まで 導いてくれぬか？| そし: The time has come, <pc>. Will you|lead me to the land of the dead? And protect|Lunana from the fangs of the beast.

6.「ありがたい。本当に 恩に着る……。| 目がかすみ…… いよいよ 誰かの手を借り: Thank you. I am truly indebted to you... my|eyes are blurry... and at last I can do|nothing without someone's help. ...

7.「だが あの杖さえ 取り戻せば……| わしも ビュブロスと戦える……。| それま: But as long as I get that staff back I can|fight Byblos, and until then I will follow you|desperately. I will follow you.

8.「<pc>…… 頼んだぞ……。| ホルタとルナナ ふたりの不幸な運命の連鎖は|: <pc>... please... Holta and Lunana,|we must break the chain of their unfortunate|fate...!

9.「引き受けてくれるのは ありがたいが……。| おぬしは…… 他の者の依頼が| た: I'm glad you're willing to do this but you|seem to have a lot of other people's requests|piling up.

10.「仕方あるまい……。| わしは しばらく ここにいるから| 先に そちらを片付け: Well, I'll be here for a while, so why don't|you go and take care of that first...

11.「そうか……。だが 情けないことに| 今のわしは ひとりでは 何もできん……。|: I see... but the pity is that now I can't do|anything on my own... and you are my only|hope...

12.「<pc>よ…… 頼む……。| 気が変わったら また来てくれんか……。| わしは: <If you change your mind please come back to|me I have to protect Lunana. I have to protect|Lunana.

13.「おお……。<pc>か……。| よく…来てくれたな……。| ルナナの足取りが……: Oh... <pc>... how nice of you... to|come... now we know... where Lunana's steps|are...

14.「ルナナは 魔獣ビュブロスを…追って……| このラニアッカから 南西のザグバン丘:
Lunana followed the Magical Beast Byblos from|here in Raniakka southwest through the Zagban|Hills to the Cave of Zaag in the far south.|
|...

15.「じつはな…… その ザアグの洞門こそ| わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討ち: You see... the Cave of Zaag is the place where|I once defeated Leon Buvrot... and where Holta|died. The place of our meeting.

16.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。| わしを…… かの地まで 導いてくれぬか？| そし: The time has come, <pc>. Will you|lead me to the land of the dead? And protect|Lunana from the fangs of the beast.

17.「わしの杖を奪った ルナナは……| 最後の…魔獣ビュブロスを追い ザグバン丘陵の:
Having taken my Staff, Lunana's Staff, she|followed the last Magical Beast Byblos to the|Cave of Zaag at the far southern end of the|
|Zagban Hills...

18.「その ザアグの洞門こそ……| わしが かつて レオン・ビュブロを討ち……| ホ: The Cave of Zaag is where I once killed Leon|Buvrot and where Holta ended up.

19.「<pc>よ…… 時は来た。| わしを…… その因縁の地まで 導き……| そして: <The time has come. Lead me to the land of our|karma and protect Lunana from the fangs of the|hexenbiest.

20.「あの杖さえ 取り戻せば……| わしも ビュブロスと戦える……。| それまでは: As long as I get that staff back I can fight|Byblos, but until then I will follow you|desperately. I'll follow you.

21.「<pc>…… 頼んだぞ……。| ホルタとルナナ ふたりの不幸な運命の連鎖は|: <pc>... please... Holta and Lunana,|we must break the chain of their unfortunate|fate...!

22.「……着いたぞ。ここが わしらの因縁の地。| よもや このようなかたちで……|: Here we are. This is the place where we had|our history. I never thought I'd visit it|again... in this form...

24.「ルナナァ……ッ！！ 杖を……| その杖を わしに よこすのだ……ッ！！: Lunanar! Give me the sceptre... and give me|the sceptre...!

25.「ふふん。遅い！| 遅いわよ 賢者ブロッゲン！: Hmmm. You're late! You're late, Sage Broggen!

26.「この魔獣は あたしのエモノよ！| こいつを倒して あたしの輝かしい経歴に| 新: This hexenbiest is mine! I will defeat this|beast and add another page to my illustrious|career!

27.「お…愚かな……。欲に 目がくらみおって……。| あの杖は… わしが使わなくては: Foolishly blinded by greed I must use the|staff.

28.「さあ 棒切れ！ いよいよ アンタの出番よ！| 目の前にいる魔獣を ケチョンケチ:
Come on, stick! Now it's your turn! Now it's|your turn... to beat the crap out of the|hexenbiest that's standing right in front of|
|you!

29.「何度 言ったら わかるでアールか！！| ワガハイは 魔獣の光線を 防ぐのみ！！: How many times have I told you? I will|only block the ray of the hexabeast! And|Broggen will finish him off!

30.「この期に及んで なに言ってるのよ！！| そんな つまんないジョークは いいから: What are you talking about? I don't want any|more of your stupid jokes. Just attack...

32.「……ハァ！？ なんで 魔物のクチから| 父さんの名前が 出てくるワケ？: Huh? Why is my father's name coming out of the|monster's mouth?

33.「グルルル……。無知とは 恐ろしい……。| どうやら ここへ おびきだされたこと: Grrrrr... ignorance is a terrible thing... and|apparently you don't even know you've been|lured here...

34.「我ら兄弟は 父を葬った ふたりの男に| 真の復讐を果たすことのみを| 使命とし: We siblings have lived our entire lives with|only one mission in mind: to exact true|revenge on the two men who buried our father.

35.「幾多の旅人から 魂を吸い集めたのは| この地に眠る 父の怨念を呼び覚ますため！:
I have gathered the souls of many a traveler|to awaken the hatred of my Dad Soul that lies|dormant in this land! Now, I will unleash my|
|true vengeance!

36.「無念の地に眠る 父 レオン・ビュブロよ！| ついに 復讐のときは 来た！| そ:
My father, Leon Buvrot, who lies in the land|of the damned! The time for vengeance has|come! Entrust me with your power, and I will|
|become a raging beast of darkness!

38.「な…なんということだ……。| あれは…… レオン・ビュブロそのもの……。| こ: Oh... my... my... my God, that was... that was|Leon Buvrot himself... that's why he came|here... to be with us... to be with us.

39.「この姿で 父のカタキを討ち| そして その血筋をも 根絶やしにする……。| そ: In this form, I will avenge my father's murder|and exterminate his bloodline... for that is|true vengeance.

40.「神父ホルタの 忘れ形見……！| まずは 貴様を 一撃で葬ってくれる！！| 震え: Father Holta's last reminder. First, he'll|bury you with a single blow! Tremble! You|little bitch!

43.「ダメだ……！ あれでは 杖が もたん……！| ヤツの…攻撃が 強すぎる……！: No! The wand is not strong enough. It's|attacking too hard.

45.「もう… 限界で…アーーーーーーール！！！！: I'm... I'm at the end of my rope...|arrrrrrrrrrr ！！！！

46.「小賢しいマネを……。: I'm not going to play coy...

47.「それほどまで 死に急ぐのなら| 貴様から 血祭りにあげてくれるわァッ！！: If you're in such a hurry to die, I'll make a|bloodbath out of you!

48.「<cs_pchero> わしは もう動けん……。| 今 この危機を救えるのは: <cs_pchero> I can no longer move and you are|the only one who can save me from this crisis.|You must strike Leon Buvrot down.

50.「我が復讐に アダなす者よ……。| また 現れたか……。: He who is addicted to my vengeance... has|appeared again...

51.「邪魔立ては 許さぬ！| 今度こそ 血祭りにあげてくれるわァッ！！: You will not stand in my way! This time,|they'll make a bloodbath of us!

54.「……ふん。| コイツ…… 父親のチカラなんかに頼るから| こんな あわれな最期: Hmm... He........it's because he relied on his|father's power that he met such a pitiful end.

55.「ルナナ……。無事で なによりだ……。| さあ その杖を わしに返せ……。| お:
Lunana I'm glad to see you're all right but|now return the staff to me as you will no|longer be needing it. You don't need it|
|anymore... do you?

56.「ハァ！？ 冗談じゃないわよ！: Huh! You've got to be kidding me!

57.「こんな使える杖 簡単に 手放すものですか！| これがあれば どんな攻撃にも耐え:
I wouldn't give up my trusty cane so easily!|You know that it can withstand any attack?|With the right tools, fame is at your|
|fingertips!

58.「それよりも……。ねえ！| なんで あの魔物 父さんのこと 知ってたの？| あな: More importantly... Hey! How did that monster|know about my father? Are you... hiding|something?

60.「……杖があれば どんな攻撃にも耐えられる？| やれやれ……。父親に頼っているの: ...and with the cane, you can withstand any|attack? Oh dear... I'm sure you're just as|dependent on your father as I am...

61.「ハァ！？ この棒 なに言ってんの！？| ワケわかんないこと 言ってんじゃないわ: Huh? What are you talking about? Don't talk|nonsense!

62.「……あたしは 名声なんか いらない！| そう言って 名の知れた父親を 嫌ってい: I don't want fame! The boy who used to hate|his famous father is now a fame freak?

63.「なんで……？ なんで そのことを……！？: Why did you...? Why did you tell me that?

65.「……はい ブロッゲンさま。| もはや 復讐の因果は 解かれましたし| ちょうど: Yes, Mr. Broggen. Now that the karma of|revenge has been undone, I thought it would be|a good time...

66.「ちょ… ちょっと 待ちなさいよ！| 今 ホルタって 言った！？| その杖が 父: Wait a minute! Did you just say Holta? You're|telling me that that cane is my father?

67.「……ルナナ よく聞きなさい。| 私は はやり病で 果てたのではありません。|: Lunana, listen to me. I did not die of an|epidemic. I was murdered by Leon Buvrot.

68.「かつて 私と ブロッゲンさまは| レオン・ビュブロと戦い 勝利しました。| だ: Once upon a time, I and the Lady Broggen|fought Leon Buvrot and we won. But the cost|was too great...

69.「……私は 致命的なキズを負い| ブロッゲンさまも また 全精力を使い果たし|: ...I was mortally wounded, and Broggen, too,|was drained of all energy and unable to take a|single step.

70.「放っておけば 死に至るのは 明白……。| たとえ 命を取り留めたとしても| 誰:
It's obvious that if left unchecked, they will|die... and even if they do survive, they won't|be able to live without the support of|
|others...

71.「ブロッゲンさまの 心と身体は| それほどまでに 弱り果てていたのです。: Broggen's mind and body were in such a|weakened state.

73.「これからは 私が 目となり クチとなり| あなたを 支えていきましょう。どうか: From now on, I will be your eyes, your mouth,|and your support. Please carry my dying soul|in your wand....

74.「……こうして 私の命は 尽きましたが| 私は ブロッゲンさまの杖として| 生ま: And so my life ended, but I was reborn as|Broggen's Staff.

75.「なかば眠っている ブロッゲンさまに代わり| 杖である私が 世話を焼いているのは: That's why I, Broggen's Staff, am taking care|of him in place of the half-asleep Broggen.

76.「そして ルナナ……。| 私は 杖となってからも| あなたのことを 見ていました: And Lunana's Staff I have been watching you|since you became a staff.

77.「ウソでしょ……。| ホントに この杖が 父さんだったなんて……。: I can't believe... this cane is really my|father.

78.「……昔の あなたは 功名心の鬼ではなかった。| しかし 今は 周りの人を巻き込:
...In the past, you were not an ogre of merit.|But now, you seem to be trying to force your|way to fame, even if it involves those around|
|you...

79.「あなたが そんな風に変わってしまったのは| 死んでしまった 私のため……。: You changed like that because of me, because|I'm dead...

80.「……そう。私以上の 名声を得ることで| 私が生きているときに できなかった親孝:
Yes. It seems to me that by achieving more|fame than I did, he is trying to fulfill the|filial piety that he could not do when I was|
|alive.

81.「本当に そうだとしたら| 私は 素直に うれしいです。| ありがとう ルナナ…: If that's really the case, I'm honestly happy.|Thank you, Lunana...

82.「ふん……。父さんが そう思うなら| 勝手に そう思ってれば？: If you think so, go ahead and think so.

84.「本当に 名声を得たいのであれば| 私利私欲を 忘れなさい。| そして 周囲から: If you really want to make a name for|yourself, forget about self-interest. And|become someone people can trust.

85.「ちょ…… ちょっと待ったッ！！| いい話になるかと思ったら お説教！？| 杖に: Wait a minute! I thought this was going to be|a good story, but now you're lecturing me? I'm|not going to be lectured by a cane!

86.「あたしは あたしのやり方で 生きていくの！| だいたいね！ あたしは昔っから|: I'm going to live my life my way! Most of the|time! I've always hated my preachy father!

87.「あー ヤダヤダ！ 自分の父親が 棒だなんて| 恥ずかしくって 誰にも言えないわ: Oh, no, no, no! I'm too embarrassed to tell|anyone that my father is a stick! I feel|really bad!

88.「ムチェッ ブチャッ！ 行くわよ！| こんなとこ さっさと引き上げましょう！: Muchacho! Buchacho! Let's go! Let's get the|hell out of here!

89.「ルナナッ！ 待ちなさい！| まだ 話が……: Lunanak! Lunana! Wait! I need to talk to you.

91.「……話なんて いつでも できるじゃない。| 父さんは そこにいるって| わかっ: We can always talk. I know you're there.

92.「それよりも…… いいッ？| その杖から しっかり見ときなさいよ！| あたしの: But more importantly... Watch me with that|cane! I'm about to make a legend out of|myself!

93.「やれやれ……。| 根は 悪い子ではないんですがねえ。| どこで 教育を 間違え: He's not a bad kid at heart, but... I wonder|where I went wrong in my education...

94.「<cs_pchero>さん。旅人の あなたなら| また あの子に 会うかもしれ: <cs_pchero>. You, a traveler, might meet her|again. I would appreciate it if you could take|care of her for me then.

95.「それではッ！ ワガハイは| いつもの しゃべり方に 戻るでアール！！| これ: Well then! I'm going back to my usual way of|speaking! I like this one a lot.

96.「<cs_pchero>……。| おぬしの おかげで ホルタ親子は救われた。|: <cs_pchero>... thanks to you, Holta and her|son were saved. I am truly grateful.

97.「これは 今までの礼だ。| 受け取ってくれ。: This is a token of my appreciation for all|you've done. Take it.

98.「<cs_pchero>よ。わしは いつか| 子供たちに 怒鳴ったことがあったな: <cs_pchero>. I once yelled at my children.|This staff is made of my sins.

99.「そう……。この杖は わしの罪だ。| 戦友のホルタに 安らかな眠りを与えず| 杖: Yes, this staff is my sin. It is my fault for|not giving my friend Holta a good night's|sleep, for locking him in the staff...

100.「犯した罪は 消えるものではない。| ……だが ホルタとルナナが 心を通わし|: The crime that has been committed cannot be|erased. But Holta and Lunana's communication|has made my heart feel a little better.

101.「今ならば あの子供たちに| 笑って 杖を 見せられるかもしれんな。: Maybe now I can show those kids the cane with|a smile on my face.

102.「それでは <cs_pchero>。| わしは この杖…ホルタと ふたたび旅に出: Well then <cs_pchero>. I'm going on my|journey again with my stick, Holta. I'll see|you again somewhere.

103.「<cs_pchero>！ さようならでアーール！| 本当に ありがとうなのでア: <cs_pchero>! Aaarghh bye bye! Thank you so|much for everything, so|aaarrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!
